name: For the Greater Good
overrideDescription: Summon a friendly Rebel unit to the front of this floor.
cardLoreTooltips: Three Divinities, Four Elemental Titans, and Two Judges. These were the Nine Divine that so ruled the Realm. The Divinities have been splintered; only one remains. Will this be the last unifier of our world? Titan against Titan? A dream, perhaps, but so was the Rail.
